content.text:
# 50 Reichspfennig (World War II German coin)

The 50 Reichspfennig coin was minted by Nazi Germany between 1939 and 1944 during World War II. It is worth  or .50 of a Reichsmark. Made entirely of aluminium, the 50 Reichspfennig is an emergency issue type, similar to the zinc 1, 5, and 10 Reichspfennig coins from the same period.
